text: Hedley Penny was a male Welsh international table tennis player. He won a bronze medal at the 1926 World Table Tennis Championships in the men's doubles with Cyril Mossford. ==See also== * List of table tennis players * List of World Table Tennis Championships medalists ==References== Category:Welsh male table tennis players Category:1905 births Category:1982 deaths Category:World Table Tennis Championships medalists
title: Hedley Penny
